About Me

Let me tell you about me!

BIO

I was never a star quarterback, or guide in bootcamp (Honor Graduate). But one thing I am, is successful in everything that I do. Why is that? Because I am a "Do'er", I do what it takes to get the job done. If I commit to a project or a team I do what it takes to see the project through. Even spending long hours learning new technologies. I will do what it takes to succeed. I have a life time of expierence in many fields with many technical skills. That coupled with my leadership abilities taught me from being a United States Marine means I can step into any situation and see to it that we are successful. I look forward to what the future brings as a Software Engineer.

SocialCatnip

Full Stack Web Developer

I am the owner of www.SocialCatnip.com a Digital Media Company. I have spent years learning the industry of Social Marketing and Web Development. I have learned several computer languages (Java, JS) and plan to learn many more. I will continue learning about Software Engineering until I have mastered them all.

Santa Maria Police Department

Police Officer

I have spent the last 15 years working as a Police Officer / Swat Operator. I have worked many major cases and done many crazy things during my time. Assignments worked were SWAT, SWAT Sniper, Narcotics, Fugitive Apprehension, Proactive Patrol, Bicycle Patrol, DUI Enforcement, Gang Enforcement and Special Assignments. I had to unfortunately switch careers due to a back injury suffered on the job.

United States Marine

Aviation Electronics Technitian

I spent my early adult life working as a USMC Avionics technician for HMLA-775 based out of Camp Pendleton, CA. I worked on UH-1N Hueys and AH-1W Super Cobras. I was deployed in support of Operation Iraqi Freedom to Al Anbar Province Iraq. I worked tirelessly with my comrades to make sure those helicopters flew every mission and supported every Marine, or Soldier they were sent to support. I was Honorably Discharged from the Marine Corps after that tour of duty.
